Perceptor:

Perceptor smiled pleaced. if he loved a thing it was that a bot=
 told him that he was a genius.

"One trouble by time... don't worry about =
the pod... I saw one here in storage could be usefull"said the male"about p=
roving your Preds alliance, don't worry, Hydras can command 'capture ya' wi=
thout harm and those minions had to obey literaly if they don't like suffer=
 the councecuences but incase that it would be needed, I can implant to thi=
s bot a device that will let ya swich the signature from max-idiot to pred =
when it will be needed... Let me give ya an advice, little one,   just try =
to don't caught Maxis attention they may look fools but most of them aren't=
 and pick every info that you can even those that can seem insigficant... t=
hat can be useful... after your mission it's done, we must make your new pe=
rsonality dissapear in that way that maxis belives that it's death..."
  --=
--- Original Message ----- 
  From: Dark Mouse 
  To: nbwrpg@...=
m 
  Sent: Sunday, May 15, 2005 11:12 PM
  Subject: Re: Reclusa


  Reclusa=
::

  She didn't like the idea of having to leave her body behind. "Any set=

  back to this plan?  Sure, it will fool the maximals, but do we have a
  =
maximal pod handy or will we have to build one? And, if I should need
  it,=
 how in the Pit will I prove I'm on our side and not the maxicreeps
  shoul=
d I get into a situation. Not every bot on this ship is going to
  know of =
this little coo except you and Hydras."  Then she smiled,
  "However, I mus=
t admit, you are a genius. Pure genius to have thought
  of such a way to c=
arry out this plan. No wonder Hydras favors you so
  highly." she said with=
 a seductive smile.
